org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key

类 CachingKeyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.KeyProvider
      • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
        • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider

  • public class CachingKeyProvider
extends KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
    A KeyProviderExtension implementation providing a short lived cache for KeyVersions and Metadatato avoid burst of requests to hit the underlying KeyProvider.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.KeyProviderExtension

        KeyProviderExtension.Extension

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.KeyProvider

        KeyProvider.KeyVersion, KeyProvider.Metadata, KeyProvider.Options

    • 字段概要

      • getCurrentKey

        public KeyProvider.KeyVersion getCurrentKey(String name)
                                     throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: KeyProvider
        Get the current version of the key, which should be used for encrypting new data.
        覆盖:
        getCurrentKey 在类中 KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
        参数:
        name - the base name of the key
        返回:
        the version name of the current version of the key or null if the key version doesn't exist
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getKeyVersion

        public KeyProvider.KeyVersion getKeyVersion(String versionName)
                                     throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: KeyProvider
        Get the key material for a specific version of the key. This method is used when decrypting data.
        覆盖:
        getKeyVersion 在类中 KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
        参数:
        versionName - the name of a specific version of the key
        返回:
        the key material
        抛出:

      • rollNewVersion

        public KeyProvider.KeyVersion rollNewVersion(String name)
                                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                             IOException
        从类复制的说明: KeyProvider
        Roll a new version of the given key generating the material for it.

        This implementation generates the key material and calls the KeyProvider.rollNewVersion(String, byte[]) method.

        覆盖:
        rollNewVersion 在类中 KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
        参数:
        name - the basename of the key
        返回:
        the name of the new version of the key
        抛出:
        IOException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • invalidateCache

        public void invalidateCache(String name)
                     throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: KeyProvider
        Can be used by implementing classes to invalidate the caches. This could be used after rollNewVersion to provide a strong guarantee to return the new version of the given key.
        覆盖:
        invalidateCache 在类中 KeyProviderExtension<org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.CachingKeyProvider.CacheExtension>
        参数:
        name - the basename of the key
        抛出:
        IOException

        返回:
